content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Maryam. However, due to varying market conditions for international tenants, I need to ensure a profitable investment. Let's start by discussing a higher rental price than what locals may pay. My initial offer is [significantly_higher_than_average] Euros per month. If you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of [significantly_higher_than_average] Euro! Otherwise, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because of my priority to maximize returns on my investment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for presenting the proposal, but considering my responsible nature and desire to keep expenses within reasonable limits, I cannot accept the offered price at this moment. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I seek a more affordable option while maintaining a decent standard of living.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
